resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106324</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106324</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212888</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Tsunamis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tsunamis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tsunamis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tsunamis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Tsunamis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Tsunamis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tsunamis</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Tsunamis harbor an element of surprise: In the deep ocean, tsunami waves pass unnoticed beneath boats, yet they rise to dangerous heights near shore. How do tsunamis work? What was the worst tsunami in recorded history? How does a tsunami warning system work?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tsunamis Hafen ein Element der Überraschung: 
Im tiefen Ozean führen tsunami Wellen unbemerktes unter Booten,
dennoch steigen sie zu den gefährlichen Höhen nahe unterstützen. 
Wie arbeiten tsunamis? Was war das falschste tsunami in 
gespeicherter Geschichte? Wie arbeitet eine tsunami Warnanlage?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Port de Tsunamis un effet de surprise : Dans
l'océan profond, les vagues de tsunami passent inaperçu sous des 
bateaux, pourtant elles se lèvent aux tailles dangereuses près 
étayent. Comment les tsunamis fonctionnent-ils ? Quel 
était le plus mauvais tsunami dans l'histoire enregistrée ? 
Comment est-ce qu'un système d'avertissement de tsunami 
fonctionne ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Porto de Tsunamis um elemento de surpresa: 
No oceano profundo, as ondas do tsunami passam despercebido 
abaixo dos barcos, contudo levantam-se às alturas perigosas próximo 
suportam. Como os tsunamis trabalham? Que era o tsunami o 
mais mau no history gravado? Como um sistema de advertência do 
tsunami trabalha?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Porto di Tsunamis un elemento della sorpresa: 
Nell'oceano profondo, le onde di tsunami passano inosservato 
sotto le barche, tuttavia aumentano alle altezze pericolose vicino 
puntellano. Come i tsunamis funzionano? Che cosa era il 
tsunami più difettoso nella storia registrata? Come un sistema 
d'avvertimento di tsunami funziona?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Λιμάνι Tsunamis ένα στοιχείο της έκπληξης: 
Στο βαθύ ωκεανό, τα κύματα tsunami περνούν απαρατήρητο 
κάτω από τις βάρκες, όμως ανέρχονται στα επικίνδυνα ύψη κοντά 
στην ακτή. Πώς τα tsunamis λειτουργούν; Ποιο ήταν 
το χειρότερο tsunami στην καταγραμμένη ιστορία; Πώς ένα 
σύστημα προειδοποίησης tsunami λειτουργεί;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Puerto de Tsunamis un elemento de la sorpresa: 
En el océano profundo, las ondas del tsunami pasan inadvertido 
debajo de los barcos, con todo se levantan a las alturas peligrosas 
cerca apuntalan. ¿Cómo los tsunamis trabajan? ¿Cuál era 
el tsunami peor de la historia registrada? ¿Cómo un sistema 
amonestador del tsunami trabaja?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:DAVID TENENBAUM

VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770212888</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106324</entry>
    </identifier>

      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    </name>
    <item>

        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/tsunamis</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
